amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to make technical corrections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
